      • import_db

        public static void import_db()
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Reads database file, decrypts and decodes it, and stores it in users variable.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - database file cannot be read

              throws java.lang.Exception

      • updateDB

        public static void updateDB(java.lang.String content)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Encrypts the data stored in the database and updates the database file.
        Parameters:
        content - new database data
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - content could not be encrypted or database file could not be updated
